*I'm using Windows10* *version of tensorflow 1.12* *Nvidia GPU* *I installed tensorflow-gpu but i have these message in my running environment:* 2018-11-18 11:31:18.966801: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX AVX2 2018-11-18 11:31:20.253752: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1432] Found device 0 with properties: name: GeForce GTX 1050 major: 6 minor: 1 memoryClockRate(GHz): 1.493 pciBusID: 0000:01:00.0 totalMemory: 4.00GiB freeMemory: 3.31GiB 2018-11-18 11:31:20.254787: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1511] Adding visible gpu devices: 0 2018-11-18 11:31:21.153266: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:982] Device interconnect StreamExecutor with strength 1 edge matrix: 2018-11-18 11:31:21.153661: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:988] 0 2018-11-18 11:31:21.153904: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1001] 0: N 2018-11-18 11:31:21.154529: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1115] Created TensorFlow device (/device:GPU:0 with 3026 MB memory) -> physical GPU (device: 0, name: GeForce GTX 1050, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 6.1) *[name: "/device:CPU:0"device_type: "CPU"memory_limit: 268435456locality {}incarnation: 4749799083155869145, name: "/device:GPU:0"device_type: "GPU"memory_limit: 3173357977locality { bus_id: 1 links { }}incarnation: 769163103206302902* *physical_device_desc: "device: 0, name: GeForce GTX 1050, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 6.1"]* 2018-11-18 11:31:21.160132: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1511] Adding visible gpu devices: 0 2018-11-18 11:31:21.160490: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:982] Device interconnect StreamExecutor with strength 1 edge matrix: 2018-11-18 11:31:21.160798: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:988] 0 2018-11-18 11:31:21.161001: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1001] 0: N 2018-11-18 11:31:21.161334: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1115] Created TensorFlow device (/device:GPU:0 with 3026 MB memory) -> physical GPU (device: 0, name: GeForce GTX 1050, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 6.1) 2018-11-18 11:31:21.163951: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1511] Adding visible gpu devices: 0 2018-11-18 11:31:21.164348: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:982] Device interconnect StreamExecutor with strength 1 edge matrix: 2018-11-18 11:31:21.164715: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:988] 0 2018-11-18 11:31:21.164968: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1001] 0: N 2018-11-18 11:31:21.165295: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1115] Created TensorFlow device (/device:GPU:0 with 3026 MB memory) -> physical GPU (device: 0, name: GeForce GTX 1050, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 6.1) *Default GPU Device: /device:GPU:0*
…
On Sun, Nov 18, 2018 at 1:33 AM Simhan Ramakrishnan < ***@***.***> wrote: As it says "Please install GPU version of TF" Tensorflow magically cannot run on GPU and i don't know much about your environment . You also have to make sure correct nvidia drivers have been installed. Please follow these instructions from here and for the right OS. Use anaconda if possible. https://www.tensorflow.org/install/ and post your comments on stack overflow instead of raising an issue — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#23773 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AqoKEnQJp7K_S1hF_WvlnAsmKguzpcvIks5uwIe4gaJpZM4Yf3BI> .
body_text:
*I'm using Windows10*
*version of tensorflow 1.12*
*Nvidia GPU*
*I installed tensorflow-gpu but  i have these message in my running
environment:*
2018-11-18 11:31:18.966801: I
tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports
instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX AVX2
2018-11-18 11:31:20.253752: I
tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1432] Found device 0 with
properties:
name: GeForce GTX 1050 major: 6 minor: 1 memoryClockRate(GHz): 1.493
pciBusID: 0000:01:00.0
totalMemory: 4.00GiB freeMemory: 3.31GiB
2018-11-18 11:31:20.254787: I
tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1511] Adding visible gpu
devices: 0
2018-11-18 11:31:21.153266: I
tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:982] Device interconnect
StreamExecutor with strength 1 edge matrix:
2018-11-18 11:31:21.153661: I
tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:988]      0
2018-11-18 11:31:21.153904: I
tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1001] 0:   N
2018-11-18 11:31:21.154529: I
tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1115] Created TensorFlow
device (/device:GPU:0 with 3026 MB memory) -> physical GPU (device: 0,
name: GeForce GTX 1050, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 6.1)

On Sun, Nov 18, 2018 at 1:33 AM Simhan Ramakrishnan < ***@***.***> wrote:
 As it says "Please install GPU version of TF"
 Tensorflow magically cannot run on GPU and i don't know much about your
 environment . You also have to make sure correct nvidia drivers have been
 installed.
 Please follow these instructions from here and for the right OS. Use
 anaconda if possible.
 https://www.tensorflow.org/install/ and post your comments on stack
 overflow instead of raising an issue
